meta.expr:content: data:post.snippet.escaped snippet { length: 147, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }
meta.name: description

meta.expr:content: data:post.snippet.escaped snippet { length: 147, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }

b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout,body#layout div.section{font-family:Arial,sans-serif}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{background-color:#fff}body#layout .add_widget a{margin-left:0;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6)!important}body#layout .widget-content{padding:12px}body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 15px 0;padding:0;border:0}body#layout div.layout-title{font-size:14px}body#layout:before{content:"iQONE - Temabanua";position:absolute;top:20px;left:25px;border-radius:4px;z-index:1;padding:10px 20px;font-size:18px;color:#fff;background:#2ecc71;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout #menu-bottom-wrapper h4,body#layout #temabanua-trend h4{display:none}body#layout #temabanua-trend>div{margin-top:0!important}body#layout{position:relative;padding:87px 25px 0 25px;max-width:920px;margin:0 auto!important;background-color:#2c3e50!important;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout .visibility .editlink{background:#2ecc71 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iQoCOwqjB-w/Wy1bDznOM4I/AAAAAAAACGA/8BUOPStr0sk5oud9hWpHBQTrmkeJDoAvACK4BGAYYCw/s18-c/mode_edit_w600_24dp.png) no-repeat center!important;padding:0;margin:0;border-radius:2px}body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{background:#2ecc71 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yTAuT5aZ1EY/Wy1eEeo4SbI/AAAAAAAACGM/FxOTPwL-Ch0_lyZxLRzhv2EWHINOmCjWACK4BGAYYCw/s22/draggable.png) no-repeat 4px 50%!important}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu,body#layout #head-right{float:left}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu,body#layout #head-right{width:32%}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu{padding-right:2%}body#layout #menu-mobile{display:inline-block;width:100%}body#layout .main-footer{display:flex}body#layout #footer-widget{width:50%;margin-right:20px}body#layout #footer-right{width:50%}body#layout #copyright{width:49%;display:inline-block;float:left}body#layout #theme-button{display:inline-block;width:49%;float:right}body#layout .Blog:before,body#layout:after{padding:5px 10px;display:block;color:#fff;font-size:12px;background:#2ecc71;position:relative;border:1px solid #213243!important;margin:0 0 15px}body#layout .Blog:before{content:"Post Blog Area";margin-bottom:8px}body#layout:after{content:"Template Blogger by Temabanua";visibility:visible}body#layout #main-menu h4:after{content:" - Main Menu Link"}body#layout #main-logo h4:after{content:" - Logo"}body#layout #main-logo h4,body#layout #main-menu h4,body#layout #menu-mobile h4,body#layout .layout-widget-description{font-size:12px!important}body#layout .section h4{padding:8px 10px;display:block;font-size:12px;color:#fff;background:#34495e;border:1px solid #455668;font-weight:400;margin:0;opacity:.8;line-height:8px}

b:switch.b:if: That is AllEso es TodoIsso é Tudo

b:if.cond: data:title != "{ads}" and not (data:widget.type == "HTML" and data:title contains "getMailchimp")

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var temabanuaMessages = { copy: "", noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "temabanua-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isError and (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "temabanua-error"))
b:section.name: Page error

b:widget.title: Get all new movie series and web show on our blog watch online and enjoy ❤️

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
<script type="text/javascript">
var uri = window.location.toString();
if (uri.indexOf("%3D","%3D") > 0) {
var clean_uri = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("%3D"));
window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, clean_uri);
}
var uri = window.location.toString();
if (uri.indexOf("%3D%3D","%3D%3D") > 0) {
var clean_uri = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("%3D%3D"));
window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, clean_uri);
}
var uri = window.location.toString();
if (uri.indexOf("&m=1","&m=1") > 0) {
var clean_uri = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("&m=1"));
window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, clean_uri);
}
var uri = window.location.toString();
if (uri.indexOf("?m=1","?m=1") > 0) {
var clean_uri = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("?m=1"));
window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, clean_uri);
}
</script>
